findings.title: Typo in tokensIntoLiqudity
findings.description: There is a typo in tokensIntoLiqudity.

findings.title: Inappropriate Location of Constant Declaration
findings.description: A series of constants are declared in the middle of the contract.

findings.title: Redundant parameters in calculateBNBReward() function
findings.description: Unused code can cause an increase in computations and unnecessary gas consumption, indicate bugs or malformed data structures, and decrease code readability.

findings.title: Incorrect versions of Solidity
findings.description: Using an old version of Solidity prevents access to new security checks and it is recommended to avoid complex pragma statements.

findings.title: Tax is applied when more than 0.01% of the total supply is sent
findings.description: The disruptiveTransfer function applies a 10% tax when transferring more than 0.01% of the total supply, but it should not be taxed.

findings.title: Weak PRNG
findings.description: Weak PRNG due to a modulo on block.timestamp, now, block.difficulty, block.number and block.gaslimit. These can be influenced by miners to some extent so they should be avoided.
